email-005.subject: Re: Invoice 2234 and next steps
email-005.body:
---SUBJECT---
Re: Invoice 2234 and next steps

---BODY---
Dear [Client Name],

Thank you for the invoice. We will process it and confirm the payment date by [Date - e.g., end of the week].

Regarding phase 2, we are eager to proceed. Could you please share the proposed agenda or scope of work for this phase? This will help us prepare effectively.

Thank you,
[Your Name]
